sentence.Network_en: The jewel has a beautiful shimmer.
sentence.Network_cn: 那颗宝石有美丽的闪光.

sentence.Network_en: The room was dark, but there was a shimmer of moonlight at the window.
sentence.Network_cn: 屋子里很黑, 但靠近窗户的地方有点微光.

sentence.Network_en: He had melted off into the surface - shimmer of the desert, into the mirage.
sentence.Network_cn: 他在沙漠里闪闪烁烁的热空气里熔化了, 在海市蜃楼的幻景里消失了.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Old English scymrian, of Germanic origin; related to German schimmern, also to shine. The noun dates from the early 19th cent

entry.def: If something shimmers, it shines with a faint, unsteady light or has an unclear, unsteady appearance.

example.ex: The lights shimmered on the water...
The trees shimmered in the afternoon heat.
example.tran: 午后的热浪中,树木闪着微光。

sentences.sentence: "the shimmer of colors on iridescent feathers"
"the play of light on the water"

means.word_mean: 1. shine with a weak or fitful light;
2. give off a shimmering reflection, as of silk

auth_sentence.content: It has a cobra-skin shimmer, a mesmerism all its own.
auth_sentence.res_content: It has a cobra-skin shimmer, a mesmerism all its own.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It has a cobra-skin shimmer, a mesmerism all its own.

auth_sentence.content: In this volume buildings like the Reich Chancellery certainly shimmer in pristinely styled photos.
auth_sentence.res_content: In this volume buildings like the Reich Chancellery certainly shimmer in pristinely styled photos.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: In this volume buildings like the Reich Chancellery certainly shimmer in pristinely styled photos.

auth_sentence.content: Blacks come in all shades from pale slates that shimmer to a bottomless darkness.
auth_sentence.res_content: Blacks come in all shades from pale slates that shimmer to a bottomless darkness.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Blacks come in all shades from pale slates that shimmer to a bottomless darkness.

sentences.en: The sea shimmered in the sunlight.
sentences.cn: 阳光下海水闪烁着微光。

sentences.en: A heat haze shimmered above the fields.
sentences.cn: 田野上方微微闪烁着一层热气。

sentences.en: The leaves on the trees shimmered pale green,almost silvery in the spring sunlight.
sentences.cn: 树上的叶子闪烁着淡绿色的光,在春天的阳光下几乎是银白色的。
